title: Kourtney Kardashian puts on a busty display in a black lacy corset
text:
She's the proud boss lady of lifestyle blog Poosh.

And Kourtney Kardashian added another role to her repertoire as soda brand spokeswoman while she took part in a photo shoot in front of a liquor store in Los Angeles.

The 40-year-old reality star was cinched in a revealing lacy corset in black that put ample cleavage on full display.

On-duty: Kourtney Kardashian added another role to her repertoire as soda brand spokeswoman while she filmed a commercial for Coca-Cola in front of a liquor store in Los Angeles

She wore a knotted wrap skirt on the bottom in the same shade and added further vamp to the look with calf-length brown boots.

Kourtney accessorized with visor-style sunglasses and held a glass bottle of the product in hand as she gazed into the distance.

She captioned the photo with the brand's famous slogan: 'It's the Real Thing.'

The commercial shoot comes days after a preview of Keeping Up With The Kardashians was released in which Kardashian asserts that she is content without a relationship for the time being.

Sweet: The 40-year-old reality star was cinched in a revealing lacy corset in black that put ample cleavage on full display

Action: She wore a knotted wrap skirt on the bottom in the same shade and added further vamp to the look with calf-length brown boots

Chatty: The commercial shoot comes days after a preview of Keeping Up With The Kardashians was released in which Kardashian asserts that she is content without a relationship for the time being

'I just feel like I’m in a different place where I just don’t feel like I need that. I’m just content hanging out with my friends,' she told pal Larsa Pippen in the clip.

The pair separated themselves from Khloe Kardashian and Malika Haqq to speak in private during a Turks and Caicos getaway.

'I just feel like I’m on a different vibe. I just feel so content with just myself, like, I don’t feel like I need anybody,' she said before acknowledging that she and Larsa are in two different places.

Getting real: 'I just feel like I’m in a different place where I just don’t feel like I need that. I’m just content hanging out with my friends,' she told pal Larsa Pippen in the clip

Listening: Larsa saw eye to eye with Kourtney, noting that she could see where she's coming from and indicated that she could see herself in the same place in the near future

Larsa saw eye to eye with Kourtney, noting that she could see where she's coming from and indicated that she could see herself in the same place in the near future.

'My energy isn’t going towards partying or guys,' Kourtney continued.

'I’d rather hang out at the house and be silly and you know dance and whatever instead…I just don’t feel like I need anyone else to hang out with, texting random guys that are meaningless.'

Keeping Up With The Kardashians airs on E! Sundays at 9 p.m.
